meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slender.
meanings.sent1: Her slenderness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The model's slenderness was admired by many.
meanings.sent3: The slenderness of the tree made it look like a delicate dancer.
meanings.sent4: The slenderness of the thread was crucial for sewing the delicate fabric.
meanings.sent5: The slenderness of the tower made it seem like it touched the sky.

meanings.definition: The condition of being slim or thin.
meanings.sent1: The slenderness of the cat allowed it to move swiftly.
meanings.sent2: She maintained her slenderness by eating healthily.
meanings.sent3: The slenderness of the pencil made it easy to hold.
meanings.sent4: The slenderness of the road led us through the narrow valley.
meanings.sent5: His slenderness made him a perfect fit for the role of the young prince.
